name: Tomato Boy
description:
A 2D pixelated platformer where a small Tomato runs into a journey to search for the meaning of his life.

Tomato Boy Soundtrack

GIving Feedback would be appreciated, as I want to try and make my first, proper Construct game be the best it can be!
This is currently unfinished and will eventually have bosses, cutscenes and 2 more levels.
This whole game has been a one man job as I have both created the music, and graphics, however 2 tracks in this game have been made by secondary school students that I've been working with, as I wanted to give some people a chance to help contribute towards this project.
